title: Title
warningTitleMore: The title can't have more than 120 characters.
warningTitleLess: The title can't have less than 20 characters.
addContent: When you click here two options will appear:

addContentOptions.addParagraph: When you click here you will be able to create a paragraph.
addContentOptions.addImage: When you click here you will be able to add an image.

preView: When you click here you'll see how your new will be displayed.
hidePreView: When you click here you will keep editing your new.
help: When you click here you can hide or show this helper.
